name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Built with love using Oracle APEX

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a Red Heart and Info on webpages built with love using Oracle APEX

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è using Oracle APEX is a Chrome extension that displays a red heart and additional information on webpages built with Oracle APEX.

For pages not using Oracle APEX, it displays a heartbroken message.

Features
üîµDetects if a webpage is built with Oracle APEX.
üîµDisplays a red heart and information on Oracle APEX pages including the APEX version
üîµShows a heartbroken emoji with a randomized sad message for non-Oracle APEX pages.
